rules_text:
Whenever a creature you control transforms or becomes promoted, put a charge counter on Tiki's Timely Transformation.
As long as Tiki's Timely Transformation has four or more charge counters on it, Shapeshifters you control get +2/+2.
As long as Tiki's Timely Transformation has seven or more charge counters on it, Tiki's Timely Transformation becomes a 7/7 Dragon Demigod creature with flying in addition to its other types.
